name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: You can now make this favourite, wintry beverage at home for a fraction of the cost of a take-out latte!
preparation:
1. In a cup or mug, stir mix with hot water until dissolved.
  2. Pour milk into a large, microwave-safe measuring cup. Microwave on high 1 min, or until milk starts to bubble. Using Milk Frother or Mini Whisk, beat until frothy.
  3. Pour frothed milk into cup. Sprinkle with cinnamon, if using.
tips: To make an iced latte, add ice to mug of mix dissolved in hot water and pour 1⁄2 cup cold milk over ice. Serve blended, if desired.
